title: Looking for a C46 Malarkey. FOUND HIM!
author: tbob

posts.post_title: Looking for a C46 Malarkey. FOUND HIM!
posts.post_content:
Raw or graded, any decent condition, will pay over "book" price.
Thanks
[url]trophybob@sbcglobal.net[/url]

posts.post_title: Re: Looking for a C46 Malarkey
posts.post_content: Wish I had this one for you Bob.  I once bought a near complete run of the Buffalo players at a local auction. Curiously, the only one missing was Malarkey.

Well Bob, looks like you're down to the last one.  Of course, after waiting a long time and finally snagging one, 5 more will pop up.  Never seems to fail.

Anyway, good luck with it. If I come across one, it'll be yours.  Best regards. Ken

Thanks Ed and Ken. It's funny that capsports (Montreal) had most of the set on ebay including all the tough Baltimore cards plus Gandil, Taylor, Kelley and McGinnity but no Malarkey! I was elated to get the Taylor because so many non-C46 collectors collect Dummy Taylor and he is very, very tough.:o
